scripts.test: mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --recursive spec  --grep "$TESTS" && npm run travis-coverall
scripts.coverage: jscov src .cov && JSCOV=.cov mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --recursive --reporter mocha-term-cov-reporter spec
scripts.coverall: jscov src .cov && JSCOV=.cov mocha --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register --recursive --reporter mocha-lcov-reporter spec
scripts.travis-coverall: if [ -n "$TRAVIS" ]; then npm run coverall | coveralls src; fi
